timeline.bodyText: Lets make the CloudRegionInfo a mutable object: add no args constructor, remove final and change @Value to @Data  to use ControllerTestUtils#assertResponse method
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: Could you please replace constructor creation with @NoArgsConstructor?
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: Are this constants shall be public?
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText:
Could you please move constants to fields as much as it possible to avoid magic values?
Do not forget to add final
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: In general, I see no point to use argument captor here and elsewhere in this class. But if for some reasons it necessary let's discuss it.
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.message: Issue #1405: RegionCreatorUtils moved to creator package, created constant fields

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should consider implementation common method to avoid such routine? Also, it would be grate to add same method for unauthorized case.
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: Could we move it to class fields to reuse? (new TypeReference<Result<List<AwsRegion>>>() { })
timeline.author: ekazachkova
tcibinan

timeline.bodyText:
It looks like all the calls to ControllerTestUtils.assertResponse in this test class as well as all the others have the same second argument. Moreover in order to use assertResponse expected result should be built beforehand using ControllerTestUtils.buildExpectedResult method.
I suppose we can introduce overloaded ControllerTestUtils.assertResponse method with only three arguments which builds expected result and compares it with an actual result. In order to do that ControllerTestUtils can be transformed to a regular bean.
What do you think @ekazachkova? Does it worth trying?
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove ControllerTestUtils class and place all it's methods to  AbstractControllerTest
timeline.author: ekazachkova
ekazachkova
ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: Could you move it to class fields?
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to use constructor injection. (add @RequiredArgsConstructor and make fields public)
timeline.author: ekazachkova

timeline.message: Issue #1405: Checkstyle fixes, CloudRegionInfo made mutable

Issue #1405: Created RegionCreatorUtils, added tests for different CloudRegions
Issue #1405: RegionCreatorUtils moved to creator package, created constant fields
Issue #1405: ControllerTestUtils refactored, mock requests extracted
Issue #1405: ControllerTestUtils methods moved to AbstractControllerTest, moved TypeReference creation to CreatorUtils
Issue #1405: ControllerTestUtils methods moved to AbstractControllerTest, moved TypeReference creation to CreatorUtils
